description:
Hakuno feels a rage build up inside of him as he lives through the repetitive virtual world of SE.RA.PH, and it fills him with a sense of purpose.
Source: Netflix

titles.title: At the Bottom of an Ancient Limbo: Preteritus Rinbus Woraago
Aujourd`hui, le fond des anciennes limbes
Ima wa Furuki Hengoku no Soko: Preteritus Rinbus Woraago
今は旧き辺獄の底 プレテリトゥス・リンブス・ヴォラーゴ
지금은 옛 고성소의 바닥: Preteritus Rinbus Woraago
